vote.title: To authorize the Director of the Department of Development to modify a service contract with the Champion Pest & Termite Control LLC to extend the end date from December 31, 2025 to December 31, 2026, to prevent a disruption in services. ($0.00)
vote.description:
Explanation
 
BACKGROUND: This legislation authorizes the Director of the Department of Development to modify a service contract with Champion Pest & Termite Control LLC to extend the end date from December 31, 2025 to December 31, 2026, to prevent a disruption in services, to provide pest control services in homes where the Department of Development is completing whole house assessments for home repairs in our Division of Housing home repair programs.
 
Original Agreement                                             $   10,000.00                     N/A                                          PO495094
Modification No. 1 amount                     $           0.00
Total contract amount                                          $   10,000.00
 
In accordance with C.C. 329.09(a): 
1.                     No additional funds are required by this ordinance.
2.                     The need for additional services was unforeseen at the time the initial contract was awarded, but a legislative modification is required by operation of C.C. 329.09(b).
3.                     It is in the City’s best interest to continue with the Champion Pest & Termite Control LLC current contract to provide pest control services in homes where the Department of Development is completing whole house assessments for home repairs in our Division of Housing home repair programs. 
 
Completing pest control in homes allows for residents to live in a healthier home and allows contractors to have the ability to complete home repairs.
 
FISCAL IMPACT: There will be no additional cost for the program.
 
 
Title
 
To authorize the Director of the Department of Development to modify a service contract with the Champion Pest & Termite Control LLC to extend the end date from December 31, 2025 to December 31, 2026, to prevent a disruption in services. ($0.00)
 
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, the Director of the Department of Development is authorized to modify a service contract with the Champion Pest & Termite Control LLC to extend the end date from December 31, 2025 to December 31, 2026, to prevent a disruption in services; and
 
WHEREAS, it has become necessary in the usual daily operation completing pest control in homes allows for residents to live in a healthier home and allows contractors to have the ability to complete home repairs.; NOW, THEREFORE,
 
BE IT ORDAINED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
SECTION 1. That the Director of the Department of Development is hereby authorized to modify a service contract with the Champion Pest & Termite Control LLC to extend the end date from December 31, 2025 to December 31, 2026, to provide pest control services in homes where the Department of Development is completing whole house assessments for home repairs in our Division of Housing home repair programs.  There will be no additional cost for the program.
SECTION 2. That this ordinance shall take effect and be in force from and after the earliest period allowed by law.
